Package avdta.network

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ImportFromVISTA
    This class defines methods to convert network data from the VISTA data format to the AVDTA data format.
    Network
    A Network contains the Nodes and Links that vehicles would pass through during simulation.
    Path
    A route, defined as a list of Links with additional functionality.
    PathList
    This class contains a list of unique Path objects.
    ReadNetwork
    This class contains methods to read network and transit data for AVDTA.
    Simulator
    A Simulator extends Network in adding Vehicles and dynamic network loading.
    TransitImportFromVISTA
    This class defines methods to convert transit data from the VISTA data format to the AVDTA data format.
